text: Mirjana "Mira" Marković (, ; 10 July 1942 – 14 April 2019) was a Serbian politician. She was the wife and widow of the Yugoslav and Serbian president Slobodan Milošević. She was the president of the Yugoslav Left political party from 2002 to 2003. Marković was wanted for fraud charges, lived under political asylum in Russia from February 2003 to her death on 14 April 2019. Marković died on 14 April 2019 in Sochi from problems caused by surgery, aged 76. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Serbian politicians Category:First Ladies Category:Fraudsters
